title: JSON Schema for openapi-processor mapping.yaml v2

package-name.description: java root package name to use in the generated source files.

bean-validation.description: enable bean validation annotations for OpenAPI constraints.

javadoc.description: generate javadoc from OpenAPI 'description' properties (since core 2021.1).

model-name-suffix.description: suffix for model class names and enum names. Default is none, i.e. an empty string (since core 2021.4).

result.description: wrapper object of a http response.

resultStyle.description: result style of a http response. 'success' uses success (ok) response type, 'all' uses Object/? type (since core 2021.5).

null.description: null wrapper of 'nullable' object properties (since core 2021.2).

items.description: maps a schema to a a Java type.

generics.description: fully qualified Java types used as generic parameters of the type mapping.

items.description: maps a parameter name to a Java type.

generics.description: fully qualified Java types used as generic parameters of the type mapping.

items.description: maps a content type to a Java type.

generics.description: fully qualified Java types used as generic parameters of the type mapping.

Exclude.description: generate endpoint to a separate 'Excluded' interface.

TypeMappingGenerics.description: fully qualified Java types used as generic parameters of the type mapping.
